column1: IF YOU WATCH MASTER CHEF MESSAGE ME
watching tonights ep of masterchef and ughhh I hate when the judges ask the contestants questions just for the sake of drama.

I’m talking about when Joe spoke with Ahran during the mystery box challenge and asked her who she thought was a strong competitor. she said willie and joe was all why not courtney? and ahran said she thought the judges might favor her, which led joe to sass back a bit
and I just dont get why that was necessary? at all? considering that willie IS a strong competitor? like that question was so clearly meant to stir up drama
they had basic recipe cards with them for certain challenges? Like the pie one in the latest episode - some of them have never made pie or even a pie crust and yet they’re just truckin along? Hmmm
nighttroll said: i think they also study recipes when theyâ€™re not filming
one of these days i’m gonna count how many times per episode gordon says “stunning”
